title: Company Policy: Returns, Refunds, Cancellations & Delivery Timelines

return_and_refund_policies.description: Clear and transparent return and refund procedures foster trust and help customers shop with confidence. A well-defined policy also protects the business by setting expectations for timeframes, conditions and processes. According to industry guidance, ecommerce stores commonly allow returns within a finite window rather than indefinitely.

eligibility_and_timeline.return_window: Customers have up to 30 days from the date of delivery to request a return or exchange. Return windows may range from 15 to 30 days, with some product categories having shorter windows of 7–10 days.
eligibility_and_timeline.condition: Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and include all tags and proof of purchase. Personalized, perishable, or final-sale products are non-returnable.
eligibility_and_timeline.exceptions: For hygiene and safety reasons, certain personal care products, consumables, and digital downloads cannot be returned.

process_for_returns.initiating_return: Contact customer support with your order ID and the reason for the return. Documentation such as photos may be requested to confirm product condition.
process_for_returns.authorization: Once approved, you will receive a return authorization and shipping instructions. Returns sent without authorization may be refused.
process_for_returns.shipping_costs: Return shipping is covered for damaged, defective, or incorrect items. For change-of-mind returns, customers may be responsible for return shipping and restocking fees.

refunds_and_exchanges.modes_of_refund: Refunds can be issued to the original payment method, as store credit, or by exchanging the item for another product.
refunds_and_exchanges.processing_time: Refunds are processed within 7–10 business days after the returned item passes inspection.
refunds_and_exchanges.exchanges: Exchanges depend on stock availability. If the requested replacement is unavailable, a refund or store credit will be offered.
